scripts.docker:start: docker run -it --name eventprocessorhost --mount source=$(pwd)/cert,target=/usr/src/app/cert,type=bind -e PROTOCOL=$PROTOCOL -e EDGE_GATEWAY=$EDGE_GATEWAY -e APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY=$APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY -e DEVICE_CONNECTION_STRING=$(az iot hub device-identity show-connection-string --hub-name $HUB --device-id $DEVICE -otsv) $REGISTRY_SERVER/iot-device-net:latest
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:start
scripts.aci:stop: rm -f aci/*.yaml && az container delete --resource-group ${GROUP} --name aci-eph --yes -oyaml
